name: Let  Stephen Rescue you Quiz | Authors | 10 Questions

questions.text: How long ago was Meghan's accident?
questions.explanation:
five years ago.

	Five years ago, Meghan was an ER nurse that was critically injured in a car accident in which Stephen and Jack gave assistance.

questions.text: What occupation was Stephen in before he became a paramedic?
questions.explanation:
firefighter & fire fighter & fireman.

	Stephen also does carpentry work. He makes checkers for Kate.

questions.text: Which O'Malley went down to Arizona to bring Stephen back?
questions.explanation:
Marcus.

	Marcus went down to Arizona to tell Stephen that Kate was pregnant and that she wanted him to come back.

questions.text: In Meghan's Christmas present to Stephen, which tape had 'The Night Before Christmas' on it?
questions.explanation:
8.

	So Stephen wouldn't get lonely, Meghan made him a box of tapes full of music with her voice introducing the songs.

questions.text: What piece of jewelry did Stephen find and take to Kate to have investigated?
questions.explanation:
ring.

	Now that Kate is pregnant she's working in robbery/fraud, so Stephen took her the ring that he found in his barn to have it checked out. The ring turns out to be an authentic ring and the owner has the fake ring.

questions.text: What is the name of Meghan's dog?
questions.explanation:
Blackie.

	Blackie is Meghan's seeing eye dog.

questions.text: Which two O'Malleys get married in this story?
questions.explanation:
Rachel and Jack.

	Rachel and Cole are marrying on a Saturday, while Jack and Cassie are getting married on Sunday and making their wedding an all-day affair. Marcus and Shari have already been married.

questions.text: Who kidnapped Meghan in order to get the real jewelry back?
questions.explanation:
Jonathen.

	Craig died of a cocaine overdose, Neil died of a heart attack, and Ken is Meghan's storm-chasing cousin.

questions.text: Stephen asked Meghan to marry him.
Who went into labor toward the end of the story?
questions.explanation:
Kate.

	Kate was involved in a hostage negotiation over Meghan and a tornado while she was in labor. She and Dave named their daughter Holly.
